scripts.deploy:ropsten: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ hodlarchitect/exchange --access-token 0e74c2eb02f042458b9b1756f9e3e270
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ sushiswap/exchange subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:fantom: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ sushiswap/fantom-exchange subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:xdai: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ sushiswap/xdai-exchange subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:bsc: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ hodlarchitect/bsc-tnet-exchange subgraph.yaml --access-token 0e74c2eb02f042458b9b1756f9e3e270
scripts.deploy:bsc-testnet: graph deploy  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ hodlarchitect/bsc-tnet-exchange subgraph.yaml --access-token 0e74c2eb02f042458b9b1756f9e3e270
scripts.deploy:okex: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ sushiswap/okex-exchange subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:celo: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ sushiswap/celo-exchange subgraph.yaml
scripts.all-deploy-ropsten: yarn prepare:ropsten && yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy:ropsten
scripts.deploy-local: yarn create-local && graph deploy --node https://test-graph.hodlverse.com/graph/ --ipfs https://test-graph.hodlverse.com/ipfs/ hodlarchitect/bsc-tnet-exchange
scripts.all-deploy-bsc-testnet: yarn prepare:bsc-testnet && yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy-local
